downloadTitle: Microsoft® Identity Manager 2016 evaluation historical version
downloadDescription: This is an evaluation release of Microsoft Identity Manager 2016 version 4.3.1935.0.
detailsSection:
This download contains a time-limited evaluation release of Microsoft® Identity Manager (MIM) 2016 client and server components, version 4.3.1935.0.

This version is provided for historical purposes, and is no longer a supported version of MIM for production use. Azure AD Premium customers should use Microsoft Identity Manager 2016 SP2 for Azure AD Premium customers. For links to the recent and supported versions of MIM, see version history.
systemRequirementsSection:
Server components
- Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 x64, Microsoft Windows Server 2012 or Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2
- Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2 x64, Microsoft SQL Server 2012, or Microsoft SQL Server 2014
- Microsoft Exchange Server 2007, Microsoft Exchange Server 2010, or Microsoft Exchange Server 2013
- SharePoint Foundation 2013 with SP1

Client components
 - Microsoft Windows 8.1
- Microsoft Windows 7
- Microsoft Outlook 2007 SP2, Microsoft Outlook 2010, or Microsoft Outlook 2013
installInstructionSection:
- Download the package to the local server or client.
- After the files are extracted, burn the ISO image to DVD or mount it.
- Note that the Synchronization and Certificate Management features in this evaluation version will stop working 180 days after first installation.
